pages.title: Manatite
pages.text: Manatite generates rarely naturally in the Overworld.$(br)Can be found from Y level 16 to Y level -64, where is less rare.$(br)Can be used to craft lots of things, but usually it has to be refined first.

A Refined Manatite is a Manatite Gem that has reached its maximum potential.$(br)The only thing that's left right now is to put its power into use.$(br)As you know, Manatites are basically a large battery of mana, but without an attunement all this power will be left unexpressed.

pages.title: Attuned Manatite
pages.text: An attuned manatite can be embedded either on a Ring or a Staff. A Ring will provide benefits for the wearer, but a Staff can manifest the full power of the Manatite in a single burst.
